modName: Arcanaeum Door Fix - Quest for Umbra -
summary: Fix for Arcanaeum Doors after using 'Quest for Umbra' mod.
descriptionHtml:
Description:

This is a simple bug fix for users who used "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24258/?]Quest for Umbra[/url]" by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2375235/?]Debdut[/url] .  It solves a problem where the College of Winterhold's doors to the
Arcanaeum will not activate even for NPCs.  I decided to release this because I dealt with this problem far longer than I thought I'd have to.

Compatibility:
* Skyrim V. 1.9.32.0.
* Any mod that does not alter the College of Winterhold.

Installation:
* Use NMM.
* Manually decompress the 'Data' file folder to .... (installation path)\Skyrim

Notes:

This mod simply deletes all the old entrances for the Arcanaeum and replaces them with new ones.  The alternative to my solution was to script edit content from the "Quest for Umbra" mod, and after I made an attempt it did not solve the issue either because I made an error or because the mod was so outdated and had some kind of conflict. It's important to do the following for this to work right.

1. Install mod.
2. Load Skyrim.
3. Go to the College of Winterhold, and open a door to the Arcanaeum.
4. Save your game.
5. Uninstall this mod. (You can delete the files).
6. Reload Skyrim and exit the Arcanaeum.
7. Celebrate with gusto.

It should also be noted that this fix may interfere with a portion of Skyrim's Main Quest.  So if you're in the middle of it while dealing with this issue, then I suggest using the entrance to the Arcanaeum from the Hall of Elements.  Also, this can be used to fix entrances to the Arcanaeum even if "Quest for Umbra" is not the culprit, I would follow the above procedure even so.

<<<Credits>>>:
Bethesda  -  For making Skyrim
The Nexus - For allowing me to host my indulgences.
author: RopeSander
